div.div: CLOSE CALLS

div.a: How Cuba Almost Became A Nuclear Power

div.div: The scariest moment in history was even scarier than we thought.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R9RVSC&via=Digg&text=How Cuba Almost Became A Nuclear Power

div.div: FEMME FATALE

div.a: In Homicide Defense, When The Beautiful Are The Damned

div.div: Women charged with murder who plead self-defense are more likely to be perceived as guilty if they have "thick lips," straight blonde hair, and aren't "a prototypical battered woman."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SPfzcE&via=Digg&text=In Homicide Defense, When The Beautiful Are The Damned

div.div: APPLE

div.a: How The iPhone 5 Boosted The Air Cargo Industry

div.div: Don't kid yourselves: the iPhone 5 absolutely affected the global economy. Here's the data to prove it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PYfZqF&via=Digg&text=How The iPhone 5 Boosted The Air Cargo Industry

div.div: CENSORSHIP

div.a: The First Evidence Of Iran's Halal Internet

div.div: Iranian officials have been threatening to create a halal version of the internet for years. Now it seems that they finally have.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5DD5F&via=Digg&text=The First Evidence Of Iran's Halal Internet

div.div: WE CAN'T HANDLE THE TRUTH
Politicians lie not because they’re wicked – though some are – but because they’ve learned that political markets rarely reward honest campaigners.
SECURITY

div.a: To Keep Passwords Safe From Hackers, Just Split Them In Half

div.div: Millions of passwords have been stolen from companies such as LinkedIn and Yahoo. A new approach aims to prevent future heists.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SOQYyy&via=Digg&text=To Keep Passwords Safe From Hackers, Just Split Them In Half

div.div: THE TALIBAN

div.a: Why The Taliban Fears Teenage Girls

div.div: The Taliban shot a 14-year-old female blogger. Here's why she scares them.
NOT COUNTING PAINT BY NUMBERS

div.a: The Greatest Fake-Art Scam In History?

div.div: How did a German hippie pull off one of the biggest, most lucrative cons in art-world history? And how did he get nailed?
ONE NATION, MANY ISSUES
If ever you needed proof of the diversity of the American electorate, this map will provide it.
IT'S A VERY LONG POEM

div.a: 'New' JRR Tolkien Epic Due Out Next Year

div.div: Lord of the Rings author's previously unseen 200-page poem of Arthurian legend draws on tales of ancient Britain rather than Middle-earth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WMHBnF&via=Digg&text='New' JRR Tolkien Epic Due Out Next Year

div.div: EYE OF THE SPARROW

div.a: Presidential Debate Gets The Bad Lip Reading Treatment

div.div: Just when you thought those Bad Lip Reading videos couldn’t get any funnier/stupider, BLR is back with a Presidential debate that will knock your socks off.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rf1R0Q&via=Digg&text=Presidential Debate Gets The Bad Lip Reading Treatment

div.div: RUBIK'S CUBE

div.a: The Little Cube That Changed The World

div.div: There's one solution out of 43 quintillion possible combinations, and even the man who invented it spent a month of solid research trying to figure it out. But that hasn't stopped the Rubik's Cube from becoming the most popular toy in history.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OT1bz2&via=Digg&text=The Little Cube That Changed The World

div.div: IS WHEEZING A RESPONSE?

div.a: Are You Likely To Respond To Exercise?

div.div: A new genetic test promises to tell you whether you are likely to benefit aerobically from exercise.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rvda2j&via=Digg&text=Are You Likely To Respond To Exercise?

div.div: FAMILY VS. ADVISERS
All five of Mitt Romney's sons want their dad to become president — but only one is spending 38 of the last 40 days of the election working to make that happen on the campaign trail.
IS IT YOU?

Your hunches about the Twitter population are probably correct. A new study by an analytics firm of 36 million users confirms some assumptions but also present some intriguing facts about ordinary Twitter users.
YOU'RE WELCOME

div.a: Christopher Walken Reading Honey Boo Boo Dialogue

div.div: Let the dulcet tones and staccato delivery of Christopher Walken soothe the pain that is listening to Honey Boo Boo.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WRvYff&via=Digg&text=Christopher Walken Reading Honey Boo Boo Dialogue

div.div: BIEBER HAIRCUT DOES NOT DETER BULLIES

div.a: Teen Gets Bullied While Being Filmed For Story About Bullying

div.div: "The student came up to me and pushed me out of the way and said 'What are you recording?'" The teen explained. "All of sudden, the student was chasing me and I needed help."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OlMBPg&via=Digg&text=Teen Gets Bullied While Being Filmed For Story About Bullying
